original: Bernstone, Stina, fil. mag., läroverksadjunkt, Kalmar, f. 3/9/02 i Landskrona av dir. Zander B. o. Maria Knutsson. — Fil. mag. 27, provår v. norra latin i Sthlm 33. Vik. ämneslär. v. Strömsnäsbruk 27, timlär. v. Landskr. komm. flicksk. 29, vik. äm-nesilär. v. Strömsniäsbruk 30, e. o. Lär. v. Landskr. komm. flicksk. 30-32, part. vik. adj. v. norra latin i Sthlm 33, vik. adj. i Falköp. 34, e. adj. v. Kristianstads h. a. 1. 34-37, adj. v. h. a. 1. i Kalmar fr. 37.
translated: Bernstone, Stina, MA, high school teacher, Kalmar, b. 3/9/02 in Landskrona to Dir. Zander B. and Maria Knutsson. - MA degree in 1927, probationary year at Norra Latin in Stockholm in 1933. Substitute subject teacher in Strömsnäsbruk in 1927, hourly teacher at Landskrona municipal girls' school in 1929, substitute subject teacher in Strömsnäsbruk in 1930, temporary teacher at Landskrona municipal girls' school from 1930-1932, substitute adjunct teacher at Norra Latin in Stockholm in 1933, substitute adjunct teacher in Falköping in 1934, adjunct teacher at Kristianstad high school from 1934-1937, adjunct teacher at high school in Kalmar from 1937 onwards.

education.description: MA degree earned in 1927 from an unknown institution

jobHistory.description: Probationary year at Norra Latin in Stockholm in 1933
